sentence.Network_en: He tasted the wine of audience approbation.
sentence.Network_cn: 他尝到了像酒般令人陶醉的听众赞许滋味.

sentence.Network_en: The manager surveyed her report with approbation.
sentence.Network_cn: 经理赞许地审读她的报告.

sentence.Network_en: Julian Lloyd Webber thinks his brother would like the approbation of serious critics.
sentence.Network_cn: 朱利安·劳埃德·韦伯认为他弟弟希望获得严肃批评家的认可。

商务英语词汇 - 商务英语百科 ... on approbation 供试用的，包退包换的 advance by rushes 突飞猛进.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : via Old French from Latin approbatio(n-), from the verb approbare (see approbate)

entry.def: Approbation is approval of something or agreement to it.

example.ex: Julian Lloyd Webber thinks his brother would like the approbation of serious critics...
example.tran: 朱利安·劳埃德·韦伯认为他弟弟希望获得严肃批评家的认可。

example.ex: The result has not met universal approbation.
example.tran: 该结果尚未获得普遍认同。

auth_sentence.content: This was received with great approbation by all, excepting my wife.
auth_sentence.res_content: This was received with great approbation by all, excepting my wife.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 很可能的,大概的;有希望的,可能的

prob测试,证明+ative表形容词→adj.检验的
approbate[v.许可,认可,承认]+ion表名词→n.称赞,认可
dis不+approbation[n.称赞,认可]→n.不答应,非难,不赞成
prob测试,证明+ation表名词→测试→试验
prob测试,证明+e→n.探针,探测器 v.[以探针等]探查,穿刺,查究
prob测试,证明+ity表名词→[人]经得起证明和试验
re反+prob正直+ate人→不正直→败坏[的人]
ap一再+prob证明+ate表动词→一再证明[可行]→批准
